text: Liu Jianxu (; 2 October 1892 – 22 March 1978), art-name Huixian (恢先), courtesy name Ziyang (子養), was a KMT general from Liling, Hunan. He participated in the Battle of Shanghai in 1937 in command of the 10th Army Group of the East Chekiang Garrison Sector. He went to Hong Kong in 1949 before immigrating to Brazil in 1951. Category:National Revolutionary Army generals from Hunan Category:1892 births Category:1978 deaths Category:People from Zhuzhou Category:People of the Northern Expedition
title: Liu Jianxu
